Description:
Crossing the desert sands you arrive at a camp located at the foot of a large altar.

You could stop for a while and take advantage of the altar to make an offering. Or use the tents in the camp to rest and regain your strength.
DescriptionAction: Do you want to make an offering or would you prefer to rest for a while?
